 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Iterable<Profiles> getAllUsers()

      • getUserById

        @GetMapping(path="/all/id/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.Optional<Profiles> getUserById(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                  int id)
        Mapping to fetch user by id.
        Parameters:
        id - path parameter - the profile id.
        Returns:
        profile object with this id or empty Optional object.

      • getUserByUsername

        @GetMapping(path="/all/username/{username}")
 @ResponseBody
public Profiles getUserByUsername(@PathVariable(value="username")
                                                                                                java.lang.String username)
        Mapping to fetch user by username.
        Parameters:
        username - path parameter - the profile username.
        Returns:
        profile object with the given username.

      • makeMod

        @PutMapping(path="/make_mod/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String makeMod(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                    int id)
        Mapping to make user a moderator.
        Parameters:
        id - id of profile to be made a moderator.
        Returns:
        "No such user found!" if unsuccessful or "User {username} is now a moderator!" if successful.

      • makeNotMod

        @PutMapping(path="/make_not_mod/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String makeNotMod(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                           int id)
        Mapping to make user not a moderator.
        Parameters:
        id - id of profile to be made a non-mod.
        Returns:
        "No such user found!" if unsuccessful or "User {username} is no longer a moderator!" if successful.
